backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister with access control, user approvals, profile storage, and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of each frontend file for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling session-based routing between login, admin panel, and user dashboard.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable square action-tile button with gradient backgrounds and size variants for dashboards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Centralized Tailwind class constants for consistent dashboard border, padding, and sizing styles.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Reusable confirmation dialog built on alert-dialog components with customizable text and actions.
Wrapper around Sonner toast API for unified success, error, and info notifications.
Admin layout shell with header, footer, logout confirmation dialog, and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: A bottom sheet component that locks page scroll, shows a backdrop, and displays dismissible slide-up content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Footer with settings and support/chat buttons styled with gradients and icons.
A centered screen frame providing a bordered, fullâ€‘height container for dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: A fullscreen modal with backdrop, scroll lock, close button, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin panel controller that switches between dashboard and various admin sections, managing logout and layout.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Bottom navigation bar for admin views with icons and active state highlighting.
Grid of action tiles linking to admin sections, with labels and gradient icons configurable through overrides.
Shared layout wrapper for admin sections with fixed header, scrollable body, and footer.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines AdminView union type and navigation item metadata for admin screens.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Loads account data from storage and displays income, expense, and due values in styled KPI cards.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Manages pending user approvals, handling duplicate checks, moving approved users to storage, and updating accounts.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Provides form and tables for adding and viewing company financial reports of type taken or due.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Displays final balance table for workers using stored bill and cost data.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Allows adding snack expenses shared among workers, updates cost balances, and manages history with delete support.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Handles adding and deleting loan/payment entries for workers and updates their cost accounts.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Adds production work entries for workers, calculates totals, updates bill accounts, and manages history with deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Wrapper that renders the system settings section.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Renders system settings tabs for branding, labels, notices, and sections, with branding including logo upload and company name editing.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Wraps the ApprovalsSection component to display and manage user approval requests.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Allows adding workers and editing or deleting their single/double rate settings, persisted in local storage.
Manages worker task entries, calculates payment amounts, stores history, and updates worker accounts with add/delete operations.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Provides the login form with branding display, handling authentication and optional switch to registration.
Handles user registration requests with duplicate checks and saves pending requests for admin approval.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Displays support threads and messaging for users and admins, allowing viewing and sending messages.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Shows a live-updating digital clock with formatted date and time.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Renders KPI summary cards for total due, total work, and total cost.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays a user's nasta history with per-entry amounts and total calculation.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Shows user's loan/payment history filtered by username and computes per-entry and total amounts.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Displays user production history entries with totals for body count and earnings.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Utility to format worker names from an entry, falling back to 'Unknown worker' if missing.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: React view for updating user profile photo, mobile number, and password with validation and session integration.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard that switches between views like production, work, payments, profile, and support.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Displays a user's filtered work history and computes their total earnings using stored history data.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Provides functions to calculate per-user and group work amounts using detail entries or fallback rate data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Hook for reading and updating branding settings stored in localStorage with event-driven sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Loads dashboard UI override labels and listens for update events to keep state synchronized.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Simple hash-based routing hook that listens to hash changes and provides navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: Loads and tracks notice configuration from storage and updates on dispatched events.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with color themes, gradients, animations, and UI utilities.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Manages branding settings in localStorage and dispatches update events; provides logo and image helpers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Manages CRUD operations for company report entries in localStorage, including filtering by type.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Stores, loads, updates, and resets customizable dashboard label overrides in localStorage with update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Handles saving and loading of user dashboard scrolling notice settings from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers for reading, writing, and validating values and arrays in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Ensures storage schema versioning by clearing legacy keys and setting a migration flag.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Stores support chat threads and messages per user in localStorage and supports message appending.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and persists stable numeric user IDs for approved users and retrieves IDs by name or mobile.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Reads, writes, and removes profile photos in localStorage using a name-based key.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Manages session state, login/logout logic, profile updates, and session persistence in localStorage.
Defines session-related types including session structure, login results, and user models.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Provides a hook to access the session context safely.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with support for hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, custom color variables, animations, typography, and container settings. Extends theme with custom HSL color tokens, fonts, radii, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state describing required updates to the user panel header, auto-incrementing user IDs, and layout fitting within a single screen. Includes feature lists, known issues, and pending requests for UI and ID logic fixes.
